content.content: Currently, I am using the metaswap codefi network API. I find it highly unreliable and uncomfortable to be dependent on an external API for fetching the gas parameters. Is there any other way, function or formula to calculate the maxFeePerGas and maxPriorityFeePerGas ? If not, then it is high time to develop a standardized function for the same. I require the gas parameters between a range : slow, medium and fast.
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback on how to calculate Type2 (EIP1559) gas fees without relying on an external API. They suggest developing a standardized function for this purpose. The post also asks if there is any other way, function, or formula to calculate the maxFeePerGas and maxPriorityFeePerGas. The post is open to constructive criticism and questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
